screen:
-= Info about function 'HASHKEYS' =-
[Syntax] HASHKEYS(<hashname>)
[Synopsis] Retrieve the keys of a HASH()
[Description] Returns a comma-delimited list of the current keys of an associative array defined by the HASH() function. Note that if you iterate over the keys of the result, adding keys during iteration will cause the result of the HASHKEYS function to change.
